owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

state.description: Either `open`, `closed`, or `all` to filter by state.

head.description: Filter pulls by head user or head organization and branch name in the format of `user:ref-name` or `organization:ref-name`. For example: `github:new-script-format` or `octocat:test-branch`.

base.description: Filter pulls by base branch name. Example: `gh-pages`.

sort.description: What to sort results by. `popularity` will sort by the number of comments. `long-running` will sort by date created and will limit the results to pull requests that have been open for more than a month and have had activity within the past month.

direction.description: The direction of the sort. Default: `desc` when sort is `created` or sort is not specified, otherwise `asc`.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
